name: Touch the void
description: Deal damage equal to the quantity of mana cards on 1 of your spells

name: Overload
description: Deal damage equal to the quantity of mana cards on 1 of your opponent's spell

name: Mutation
description: Gain 1 mana card. Deal damage equal to that mana's power

name: Stone crush
description: Deal 1 damage for each mana card in your opponent's hand

name: Mist of pain
description: Your opponent may discard up to 4 mana cards from their hand. For each mana they do not discard, deal 1 damage

name: Arcane tactics
description: Gain 7 mana cards from the mana deck. Then place 4 mana cards from your hand on top of the mana deck in any order

name: Freeze
description: Choose 1: Gain 4 mana cards, or place a mana card from the mana deck on one of your opponent's spells

name: Energy reserve
description: Pick up a mana card off 1 of your other spells. Gain mana equal to that mana's power

name: Fracture
description: Gain 4 mana cards. You may move a mana card between 2 of your other spells

name: Gleam of hope
description: Gain mana until you have 5 mana cards in your hand

name: Rejuvenation
description: Choose 1: Gain 4 mana cards, or take 2 mana cards of any power from the discard pile

name: Shackled motion
description: Choose 1: Gain 4 mana cards, or your opponent must discard their hand

name: Living wind
description: Gain 6 mana cards, gain 1 fewer mana for each of your other spells that have a mana on them

name: Coercive agreement
description: Choose 1: Take up to 3 randomly selected mana from your opponent's hand, or discard a mana card off 2 of your other spells

name: Arcane eye
description: Pick up a mana card off each of your spells that costs 3 or more

name: Haste
description: The next time you cast a spell this turn, it costs 2 less

name: Renewed fervor
description: Pick up a mana card off each of your instant attack spells that costs 2 or less

name: Secret oath
description: As long as this spell has mana on it, if your opponent has a 4 power mana in their hand, they must give it to you immediately

name: Time distortion
description: Pick up a mana card off 2 of your other spells

name: Betrayal
description: Deal 5 damage. Your opponent gains 3 mana cards

name: Blood lust
description: Deal 1 damage. Deal an additionnal 2 damage for each attack spell cast consecutively before this spell

name: Delusion
description: Deal 3 damage. You may pick up a mana card off 1 of your opponent's spells

name: Vile laughter
description: Deal 6 damage, minus the highest power mana in your hand

name: Doom drop
description: Each time a mana card is discarded of this spell, deal damage equal to that mana's power

name: Energy storm
description: Deal 3 damage. Deal 1 additional damage for each 4 power mana in your hand

name: Fire blast
description: Discard all mana in your hand. Deal 7 damage

name: Painful vision
description: Deal 5 damage. Place a mana from the mana deck on all your spells with 1 mana card on them

name: Possessed
description: Deal 5 damage. Your opponent may give you a mana from their hand. If they do, reduce your damage by the mana's power

name: Second strike
description: Deal 3 damage. The next time you cast an attack spell this turn, it costs 1 less

name: Trap attack
description: Pick up a mana card off 1 of your other spells. Deal damage equal to that mana's power

name: Energy shield
description: Pick up a mana card off 1 of your other spells. Place a mana card from the mana deck on 1 of your opponent's spells

name: Growth
description: During your turn, increase the power of all mana by 1

name: Fury
description: Deal 1 damage for each of your opponent's spells that have mana on them

name: Hellstorm
description: Gain 5 mana cards. Deal damage equal to the highest power mana you gain

name: Shadow attack
description: Discard a mana card off 1 of your other spells. Deal damage and gain mana equal to that mana's power

name: Crushing blow
description: Deal 6 damage

name: False face
description: If you deal 1 or less damage during your basic attack phase, deal 3 damage when your turn ends

name: Quick swap
description: Each time you discard off this spell, choose 1: deal 1 damage, or discard this spell and replace it with a new spell

name: Lullaby
description: As long as there is mana on this spell, if you have 0 mana cards in your hand, gain 2 mana cards

name: Amnesia
description: Deal 1 damage. Deal 1 additional damage for each time this spell was cast previously this turn

name: Hoodwink
description: Deal 6 damage, minus the damage your opponent dealt their last basic attack phase

name: Wild bloom
description: When you discard the last mana off this spell, you may immediately cast an instant spell of yours that has 0 mana on it for no cost

name: Tsunami
description: Gain 1 mana card. Deal 1 damage for each mana of a unique power in your hand

name: Twist of fate
description: Deal 2 damage. You may discard and replace 1 of your other spells with a new spell. Move all mana on it onto the new spell

name: Fatal flaw
description: Deal 1 damage. Reveal the top mana card on 1 of your opponents spells, dealing additional damage equal to it's power

name: Affliction
description: Gain 4 mana cards. You may deal 1 damage to yourself. If you do, gain 2 extra cards

name: Friendly truce
description: Your opponent may give you 3 cards from their hand. If they do not, gain 5 mana cards

name: Windstorm
description: Deal 2 damage, then reveal a mana card from the mana deck. If it's a 1 power mana card, place it on this spell

name: Guilty bond
description: Show your opponent a mana from your hand. Deal 2 damage if they have a mana of the same power in their hand

name: Trance state
description: Deal 3 damage, minus 1 damage for each mana card in your hand

name: Renewal
description: Gain mana until you have 4 mana cards in your hand

name: Toxic gift
description: Give your opponent a mana card from your hand. If you do, deal damage equal to its power

name: Wrath
description: Your opponent may discard 2 mana cards from their hand. If they do not, deal 2 damage

name: Reckless attack
description: Deal 1 damage each time you discard off this spell. If you discard a 4 power mana off this spell, deal 4 damage instead

name: Shared power
description: You may give your opponent 1 mana card from your hand. If you do, gain 4 mana cards

name: Sleight of hand
description: Gain 1 mana card. Gain additional mana equal to that mana's power

name: Soul pact
description: If the previous spell you cast this turn was an instant attack spell, gain mana equal to the damage dealt by that spell

name: Mirror image
description: Gain mana equal to the quantity of mana cards on 1 of your spells

name: Battle vision
description: When your opponent basic attacks, you may discard a mana card of the same power from your hand to block the damage

name: Silent support
description: Each time you discard off this spell, pick up a mana off 1 of your other spells

name: Power hungry
description: Both players basic attack mana cards go to your hand instead of the discard pile

name: Sneaky deal
description: Choose 1: Deal 1 damage, or discard a mana card off 1 of your other spells

name: Puppetmaster
description: In order to basic attack, your opponent must use a mana of the same power as you did during the previous basic attack phase

name: Contamination
description: Place 2 mana cards from your hand on the mana deck. If you do, deal 4 damage

name: Dance of pain
description: Deal 3 damage. Discard or gain mana until you have 2 mana cards in your hand

name: Drain soul
description: Your opponent must give you the highest power card mana in their hand. Deal damage equal to that mana's power

name: Ice storm
description: Deal 1 damage for each of your spells with exactly 1 mana card on them

name: After shock
description: Gain 1 mana card. Place 1 mana card on the mana deck and deal damage equal to its power

name: Bad fortune
description: Deal 4 damage. Reveal 3 cards from the mana deck. Place any revealed 1 power mana on this spell. Return the rest in any order

name: Force of nature
description: Deal 4 damage, minus 1 damage for each of your other attack spells that have mana on them

name: Backfire
description: Your opponent gains 1 mana card. They take damage equal to its power

name: Echo
description: Deal 3 damage. If you cast 1 of your other instant spells immediately before this and it cost 1 or less, this spell gains that spell's effect

name: Invisible friend
description: Reveal 6 mana cards from the mana deck. Place the highest power mana back on the top of the mana deck. Gain the remaining 5 mana

name: Symbiosis
description: Gain a quantity of mana cards equal to the damage dealt by your opponent's previous basic attack

name: Death spiral
description: This spell costs 0 if the previous spell you cast cost 3 or more. Deal 2 damage

name: Transfigure
description: Gain 4 mana. You may choose to gain 1 less mana to destroy 1 of your spells that has no mana on it

name: Shadow oath
description: Pick up a mana card off one of your other spells. You opponent gains 1 mana card

name: Eclipse
description: Reveal 3 mana cards from the mana deck, place them on any mix of your spells or your opponent's spells
